Text.Page:
Mission Orders

The naga sentries at Viper Strand are gathering intelligence on our troop movements and forewarning their brethren inland.

Clear out {@LinkCreature:10#16#naga clawriders} so that our troop movements are unobserved.

Report to Coordinator Briale when mission is complete.
You've earned the thanks of the federation. Your guild is an inspiration to all!
It looks like you haven't completed your mission yet.
